search_results.snippet:
21 Grams is a 2003 American drama film directed by Mexican director Alejandro 
Gonzlez Irritu from a screenplay written by Guillermo Arriaga. It stars Sean 
Penn, Naomi Watts, Charlotte Gainsbourg, Danny Huston and Benicio Del Toro.
